item.title: Safari for Windows Beta
item.description: Many of you know that I’m a big-time Microsoft guy. Still, I have to keep my eye on the competition. Tonight I decided to try Apple’s Safari for Windows. It’s a beta version, but it’s about the 3rd beta. I have to admit, it’s impressive. The Clear Text is a little easier to read than IE7 and miles more readable than FireFox. Performance is excellent. The look, though, is fantastic. Nothing on the screeen that you don’t need–unless you want it.
